Uses of Class
com.android.animals.Animal

Packages that use Animal
Package Description
com.android.animals  
com.android.generics  

  • Uses of Animal in com.android.animals

    Subclasses of Animal in com.android.animals
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Cow
    Cow class subclass of Animal, uses an inner static class to create a Cow
    class  Elephant
    sub class of Animal
    class  Zebra
    simple class Zebra which is a sub class of Animal

  • Uses of Animal in com.android.generics

    Classes in com.android.generics with type parameters of type Animal
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Box<T extends Animal>
    a Generic can be defined as a subclass of another class here the generic we will say can be an Animal or a subclass of Animal so methods first defined in the Animal class, can be used by this object, as well as those first defined in the object class
    class  Kettle<T extends Animal,​V extends Behaviour,​E extends Number>
    can have more than one generic type, here we have three generic types T will be a type that extends the Animal class V will be a type that implements the Behaviour interface E can be any type of Number (Number is a superclass of all wrapper number classes Integer,Double,Float,Byte,Short,Long
    Fields in com.android.generics declared as Animal
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private T Box.myAnimal
    this will be a variable of whatever type we say T will be, type T can only be a Animal or subclass of Animal, only three classes are subclasses of Animal, Cow, Elephant and Zebra so if we say Box<Zebra>zedBox type T will be a Zebra and myAnimal will be a Zebra and anywhere else in the Box class type T will be a Zebra
    (package private) T Kettle.myT
    T can be a Animal or it subclasses which are Elephant, Zebra and Cow
